entry.title: [Absolute Pulsation] Featured Weapon Convene: Boosted Drop Rate for Whispers of Sirens
entry.content:
During the event, 5-Star Weapon: Whispers of Sirens, 4-Star Weapons: Jinzhou Keeper, Celestial Spiral, and Lunar Cutter receive boosted drop rates!

Duration

2025-12-11 10:00 - 2025-12-24 11:59 (server time)

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in ""First Resonance"" and activate the Convene function.

Convene Rules

  • [Absolute Pulsation] is a Featured Weapon Convene event banner.

  • Use Forging Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or Weapon every 10 attempts.

  • The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Weapon Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Weapon is obtained.

  • The 5-Star Weapon you Convene is guaranteed to be Whispers of Sirens.

  • Featured Weapon Whispers of Sirens is exclusive to the Featured Weapon Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.

For more details, please refer to the in-game Convene page.

entry.title: [Neptune's Lullaby] Featured Resonator Convene: Boosted Drop Rate for Cantarella
entry.content:
During the event, 5-Star Resonator: Cantarella, 4-Star Resonators: Buling, Danjin and Chixia receive boosted drop rates!

Duration

2025-12-11 10:00 - 2025-12-24 11:59 (server time)

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in ""First Resonance"" and activate the Convene function.

Convene Rules

  • [Neptune's Lullaby] is a Featured Resonator Convene event banner.

  • Use Radiant Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or Weapon every 10 attempts.

  • The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Resonator Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Resonator is obtained.

  • Featured Resonator Cantarella is exclusive to the [Neptune's Lullaby] Featured Resonator Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.

  • Featured Resonator Cantarella's Waveband will be simultaneously made available in the Afterglow Coral Store with a limit of 2 purchases, and it will be removed once the Convene event ends.

  • During the event, all the Resonators who receive boosted drop rates will become available in Ascendant Aces as Trial Resonators. Complete their Ascendant Aces challenges to obtain rewards.

  • After the event ends, starting from the next version, 4-Star Resonator Buling will be permanently available in Featured Resonator/Weapon Convene and Standard Resonator/Weapon Convene.

  • 4-Star Resonator Buling will be simultaneously made available in the Afterglow Coral Store and will be removed at the end of the next version.

Resonator Buling costs 80 Afterglow Corals and can only be purchased once from the Afterglow Coral Store. If you already own the Resonator, you will get Buling's Waveband instead.

For more details, please refer to the in-game Convene page.

entry.title: Resonator Review | Sea of Dreams — Cantarella
entry.content:
The current head of Fisalia, Cantarella, the Bane.

A mysterious noblewoman, her beauty as captivating as it is perilous. She resides in a crown-like castle perched atop the mountain, where illusory dreams flow like streams, meticulously spun by her own hands.

entry.title: Resonator Review | Symphony of Beyond — Phrolova
entry.content:
Phrolova, a Fractsidus Overseer walking the fine line between life and death, an uncanny, deadly conductor.

A silent wave of her baton is enough to attune the very frequencies of being and conduct the symphonies of "souls." The music of hers can sculpt a better world or, just as easily, summon a legion to wreak havoc.

entry.title: Notice on the Upgrade and Maintenance of the [Reprise of Tides] Returnee Event
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To enhance your gameplay experience, we will be upgrading the Reprise of Tides Returnee Event in Version 3.0. As part of this update, the event will be temporarily unavailable for maintenance. Please take note of the scheduled maintenance time, and we appreciate your understanding for any inconvenience caused.

For details about the improved Reprise of Tides Returnee Event, please refer to the upcoming official announcements.

Maintenance Schedule

2025-12-10 04:00 (server time) - Version 3.0 update

Requirements for Participation in Reprise of Tides

  • You have reached Union Level 8.

  • You have not logged in for at least 30 consecutive days.

  • At least 30 days have passed since the end date of the last Reprise of Tides event that you participated in.

Rovers who meet the above requirements can activate Reprise of Tides, which will last for 14 days upon activation.

Regarding the Accessibility of Reprise of Tides

If you activate Reprise of Tides before maintenance starts, your access will remain unaffected.

If you meet the returnee requirements during the maintenance period, you will temporarily be unable to access the event until maintenance is over. Access will be granted to the updated Reprise of Tides Returnee Event once Version 3.0 goes live.

●If you meet the returnee requirements after maintenance, you will be able to access the updated Reprise of Tides Returnee Event.

entry.title: [Lollo Campaign: Rising Anew] Featured Commission Event
entry.content:
Maji, the idea king, is back with yet another new campaign. This time, he's riding the tech wave and trying to create his very own smart assistant, Lollo Genie.

Interact with adorable Echoes and submit their behavioural data to Maji to collect Lollo Stamps and participate in the thrilling lottery!

Duration

2025-12-08 04:00 - 2025-12-22 03:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x400, Lustrous Tide x5, Premium Tuner x100, Forgery Premium Supply x10, Premium Sealed Tube x15, Crystal Solvent x6, Advanced Enclosure Tank x12, Advanced Sealed Tube x24, Shell Credit x100000

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 14 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Prologue ""Through the Sea Thou Break.""

Event Rules

  • During the event, you can complete Lollo Campaigns to obtain a set number of Lollo Stamps. Each Lollo Stamp lets you peel off one Lollo Campaign lottery ticket.

  • After the event ends, the unfinished Lollo Campaigns will not be available, and all the remaining Lollo Stamps will be recycled.

entry.title: Post-Lament Anthropocene: Comprehensive Mirror for Historians—Lahai-Roi
entry.content:
Post-Lament Anthropocene: Comprehensive Mirror for Historians—Lahai-Roi

Lahai-Roi, known as Solaris's Extreme, is situated beneath the Roya Frostlands and is where Spacetrek Collective's Startorch Academy was established.

Take a sneak peek at Lahai-Roi before heading there!

entry.title: [Tactical Simulacra: Off Tune] Featured Combat Event
entry.content:
As the Tactical Simulacra project advances, the Huaxu Academy has successfully achieved the measurement of Tunability, a property through which countless Reverberations converge into Tacet Discords. Disrupting their Tunability would mean a lethal blow that paralyzes them...

Duration

2025-11-27 04:00 - 2025-12-15 03:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x600, Premium Resonance Potion x16, Premium Energy Core x16, Premium Sealed Tube x16, Premium Tuner x100, Shell Credit x608888, and other Materials.

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 14.

Event Rules

  • In Tactical Simulacra: Off Tune, challenge waves of powerful enemies using special buffs across different simulation domains.

  • Tactical Simulacra: Off Tune has a total of 6 stages. Reach 1000 points in a stage to unlock the next one.

  • As you complete more challenges, new special buffs will be available to you in the subsequent challenges.

  • The results of each challenge will be tallied based on Monster Points, Time Points, and Technical Points. Monster Points are earned by defeating enemies in challenges; Time Points are earned based on the time remaining at challenge completion and a conversation factor that increases with the number of enemies that are defeated; Technical Points are earned by triggering Counterattacks, successful Dodges, and Dodge Counters.

In Tactical Simulacra: Off Tune, some of your attacks build up certain enemies' Off-Tune Level. Once their Off-Tune Level reaches the limit, they enter the Mistune state. During this state, you can unleash a powerful Tune Break to shatter their defenses. Landing a Tune Break resets the enemies' Off-Tune Level and inflicts Tune Disruption, leaving them vulnerable to follow-up attacks.

entry.title: V2.8 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2025/11/20 - 2025/12/18 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "To the City Set in Amber" is now live!
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "To the City Set in Amber" is now live! Post your work with hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook and fill out the form for a chance to win iPhone 16 Pro 512GB, Astrites and more!

Create your works of boundless imagination to present the world of Wuthering Waves!

Proceed to submit: <https://forms.gle/wkPmsgEBDouGWghL6>

Content Requirement

Create your own artwork about Wuthering Waves Version 2.8 "To the City Set in Amber"!

Whether it's an illustration of your beloved character, comical moments from your adventures, or difficult combos you've mastered—anything that aligns with the theme is eligible for submission. Share your artwork or video for a chance to win exciting prizes!

How to Submit

  1. Post your artwork on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart included.

  2. Complete the submission form with your submission details. Once done, your submission will be considered successful.

  • Please quote your post link with the right hashtags published publicly on the designated platforms.

Submission form: <https://forms.gle/wkPmsgEBDouGWghL6>

Submission Period

2025/11/20 - 2025/12/14 (PT)

Rewards

1st Place (5 Winners): iPhone 17 Pro 512GB

2nd Place (5 Winners): 6,000 Astrites & 800 USD

3rd Place (10 Winners): 3,000 Astrites & 400 USD

4th Place (15 Winners): 2,000 Astrites & 200 USD

5th Place (20 Winners): 1,000 Astrites & $50 Amazon Gift Card

Lucky Prize (20 Winners): $20 Amazon Gift Card

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

  1. To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart in your post and fill out the submission form.

  2. Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

  3. You can submit multiple entries and win multiple rewards. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

  4. Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works previously entered into other fan creation events

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

  1. Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

  2. This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

  3. By participating in the event, you grant KURO GAMES the right to freely republish your submitted content on the internet and social media platforms, with appropriate credit given to the creator. No additional notice will be provided prior to publication.

  4. This event is available solely to participants on the designated servers listed below: America, Europe, Asia, SEA, HMT(HK,MO,TW).

entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.8: To the City Set in Amber
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.8: To the City Set in Amber.

Maintenance Time & Compensation Details

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-11-20 04:00 - 2025-11-20 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-11-20 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation will remain claimable until the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-11-20 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation will remain claimable until the next version update.

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Chisa (Havoc/Broadblade)

"Just an ordinary student."

Calmly, she introduces herself, a faint iridescent shimmer flickering in her eyes. Again, the structures of the world reveal themselves in her vision. Narrowing her eyes, she singles out the very thread that tugs at life itself.

Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Resonance Liberation DMG, Havoc Bane

Obtainable through the [Horizon of Dawnbreak] Featured Resonator Convene.

4-Star Resonator: Buling (Electro/Rectifier)

Taoist of Mengzhou, Black Shores Consultant, feng shui master, and veteran forum dweller.

Easygoing and well-traveled, Buling will "bling" whatever you seek.

Combat Roles: Support and Healer, DMG Amplification, Resonance Skill DMG Amplification, Electro Flare

Obtainable through the [Requiem Without End] and [Neptune's Lullaby] Featured Resonator Convene. After the event ends, starting from the next version, 4-Star Resonator Buling will be permanently available in Featured Resonator/Weapon Convene and Standard Resonator/Weapon Convene.

4-Star Resonator Buling will be simultaneously made available in the Afterglow Coral Store and will be removed at the end of the next version.

New Weapon

5-Star Weapon: Kumokiri (Broadblade)

A crimson thread emerges in the void, as if binding the structures of all things onto a single thread.

At her fingertips, the endless season is drawn taut, snipped, and rewoven, until the scattered path at last converges once more upon this timeline.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Kumokiri] Featured Weapon Convene.

New Area

Chronorift Metropolis

A ruined city, like amber trapped in the Sonoro. Once-bustling streets lie overgrown with wild grass, low roads swallowed by seawater. The Lament repeats endlessly, and time and space are fractured, but this view seems frozen, stopped in a silent eternity.

Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act XII "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

New Echoes

Nightmare: Roseshroom, Nightmare: Tick Tack, Nightmare: Dwarf Cassowary

New Nightmare Purification challenge: Honami City Nightmare Nest

In Nightmare Purification, a set number of Nightmare Tacet Discords are available daily. Defeat them to claim the corresponding Echoes without spending Waveplates.

New Sonata Effect: Thread of Severed Fate

Thread of Severed Fate (3pcs Set): Inflicting Havoc Bane increases the Resonator's ATK by 20% and grants 30% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus for 5s.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act XII "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands"

With events in Rinascita finally over, you return once more to the Black Shores to find them investigating abnormal frequencies in nearby waters. During the investigation, you are pulled into the rift and soon awaken in a ruined, restless city. And as the situation grows dire, a mysterious black-haired girl appears before you… At this point, where time is frozen, sever the endless loop and embrace the dawn of the future.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.8 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act XI "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides."

[Main Quest] Chapter II Segue "Flowing Starlight in the Iris"

After the crisis in Honami City was resolved, Chisa received treatment at the Black Shores. You've been apart ever since. Now, it's time to visit her again. For both of you, this will be a new beginning... The connection you've built and the words you didn't get to say the first time around are the starlight that guides your way.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.8 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act XII "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

New Events & Gameplay Features

[Special Events]:

[Stranger Things in Honami] Combat Event

Explore the strange occurrences in Honami City and unravel their stories in the Stranger Things in Honami event.

  • Duration: Version 2.8 update - 2025-12-24 11:59 (server time)

[Whispers of the Waves] Photo Collection Event

A total of 6 Chrono Traces are scattered throughout Chronorift Metropolis. Explore areas according to the clues and snap the correct photo or search the target location to complete Collection tasks and claim the rewards.

  • Duration: Version 2.8 update - 2025-12-24 03:59 (server time)

[Tactical Simulacra: Off Tune] Featured Combat Event

Challenge waves of powerful enemies by using special buffs across different simulation domains.

  • Duration: 2025-11-27 04:00 - 2025-12-15 03:59 (server time)

[Lollo Campaign: Rising Anew] Featured Commission Event

During the event, you can complete Lollo Campaigns to obtain a set number of Lollo Stamps. Each Lollo Stamp lets you peel off one Lollo Campaign lottery ticket.

  • Duration: 2025-12-08 04:00 - 2025-12-22 03:59 (server time)

[Search for It! Bits of Lahai-Roi] Showcase Event

Once the event begins, Namipon will provide a new clue each day about a castaway object. Track down the correct object and uncover its hidden message to earn rewards.

  • Duration: 2025-12-11 10:00 - 2025-12-24 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of Amber] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in to claim the day's login rewards from the event page.

  • Duration: Version 2.8 update - 2025-12-24 03:59 (server time)

Other New Content

New Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain Challenge: The False Sovereign

New Outfit: Downtown Repose (Zani - Deluxe Outfit)

New Phantom Echo: Phantom - The False Sovereign

New Avatar: Post-Doomsday Coffee

New Title: Honami Doom Walker

Partipate in the combat event "Stranger Things in Honami" to win Phantom: The False Sovereign (Phantom Echo), Post-Doomsday Coffee (Avatar), Honami Doom Walker (Title).

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Features

**

Negative Statuses**

Adjusted the effects of Havoc Bane, Fusion Burst, Glacio Chafe, and Electro Flare.

[Havoc Bane]

  • Some Havoc attacks will apply a stackable Havoc Bane effect to the target.

  • While Havoc Bane lasts, the DEF of the inflicted target is reduced. Havoc Bane stacks up to 3 times by default, with each stack reducing the target's DEF by 2%.

[Fusion Burst]

  • Some Fusion attacks will apply a stackable Fusion Burst effect to the target.

  • When Fusion Burst is stacked to its max, all stacks will be removed to trigger an explosion, dealing Fusion DMG around the target. Fusion Burst effect stacks up to 10 times by default. The higher the stacks, the more DMG dealt.

[Glacio Chafe]

  • Some Glacio attacks will apply a stackable Glacio Chafe effect to the target.

  • When Glacio Chafe is inflicted, the target receives Glacio DMG. Glacio Chafe stacks up to 10 times by default. The higher the stacks, the more DMG dealt. Each stack of Glacio Chafe effect reduces the target's Movement Speed.

  • When Glacio Chafe reaches max stacks, the target will be frozen, and all stacks of Glacio Chafe will be removed. Struggle to accelerate your recovery from the frozen state.

[Electro Flare]

  • Some Electro attacks will apply a stackable Electro Flare effect to the target.

  • While Electro Flare lasts, it deals periodic Electro DMG to the target. The target loses half of the effect stacks with each instance of damage. Electro Flare stacks up to 10 times by default. The higher the stacks, the more DMG dealt.

  • At maximum stacks of Electro Flare, any new stack inflicted becomes stackable Electro Rage. Electro Rage increases the DMG dealt by the next Electro Flare trigger. Electro Rage is removed once triggered. Electro Rage stacks up to 10 times by default. The higher the stacks, the more DMG Electro Flare deals.

**

Echo Recommendation**

Added a "Main Echo" slot

  • A "Main Echo" slot will be added to the "Suggest" feature on the Echo equipment menu, in addition to the existing "Mainstat" and "Substat" slots.

  • The top three most-equipped Main Echoes will be displayed along with their respective percentages.

  • Selecting a suggested Main Echo will automatically filter the listed Echoes and display only all examples of the selected Main Echo.

**

One-click Absorption of Echoes**

Adjusted Echo absorption

  • One-click absorption of all absorbable Echoes within a certain range instead of one-by-one absorption.

  • Wider absorption radius inside a Nightmare Nest than in the Overworld.

Leveling

**

Auto Supplement:**

Added the "Auto Supplement" feature

  • Added the "Auto Supplement" feature to the Resonator Ascension, Weapon Ascension, and Skill Upgrade menus. If you already have all the required upgrade materials, you can proceed with the Ascension/Upgrade process as usual. If the required upgrade materials are insufficient, clicking the "Auto Supplement" button will open the Auto Supplement screen.

  • Through the Auto Supplement screen, you can see what materials you have and how many more you need, and use Synthesis, Conversion, or Supply Packs to obtain the rest of the required materials.

  • During Purification, if low-rarity materials are insufficient, the system will begin searching for lower-rarity materials and Supply Packs to auto-fill the required material list until all requirements are met.

  • If Synthesis, Conversion, and Supply Packs still cannot provide enough materials, a shortcut button will appear to direct you to where you can acquire more.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

**

Whimpering Wastes & Tower of Adversity**

Adjusted certain functions in Whimpering Wastes and Tower of Adversity

- Only the [Utilities] menu, [Chat] menu, and [Details] menu of the current stage will be accessible during a Whimpering Wastes or Tower of Adversity challenge.

  • Opening the Utility wheel or accessing certain features during a Whimpering Wastes or Tower of Adversity challenge will no longer freeze or slow the time.

  • When a Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain challenge is initiated again, the Resonators' STA will now instantly be restored to the maximum.

  • Following the Version 2.8 update, when you reenter a domain, the Utility tool that was selected when you exited it will be automatically selected.

  • Adjusted the eligibility requirements for initiating some Nightmare Nest challenges.

Controls

  • Optimized the display of function buttons during cutscenes in controller mode to prevent conflicts with QTE prompts.

UI

**

Guidebook:**

Adjusted the display and functionality of Guidebook

  • Tower of Adversity, Whimpering Wastes, Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways in the Recurring Challenges section of Guidebook will be put under their own tab, also called Recurring Challenges.

  • The other content of the Recurring Challenges section of Guidebook will be put under a new tab, called Material Spots.

  • Adjusted the display of the Weekly Challenge section. The challenges will be displayed in the order in which the respective bosses appear in the game.

  • Added a reminder for recommended events. When a recommended event is in the limited-time period, a reminder will appear on the main screen when you enter the game.

  • In the prompt that appears after exiting or completing a Boss Challenge, a "Restart" button will now appear.

Graphics & Performance

**

Graphics Settings**

Added High Quality as a Graphics Quality option.

  • Added High Quality as a Graphics Quality option on PC between Ultra Quality and Quality.

  • To enable the High Quality option, your graphics card must meet either of the two requirements listed below:

  1. NVIDIA RTX 4070 or newer

  2. AMD RX 7700 or newer, AMD RX 9000 or newer

**

Lighting Effects**

Optimized the lighting effects

  • Added support for DFAO (Distance Field Ambient Occlusion) on PC under some PC graphics settings to partially improve the lighting effects.

  • Optimized the Global Illumination effects for some indoor scenes.

**

Performance Optimizations**

Optimized the game's overall efficiency

  • Following the version 2.8 update, the GPU load from Ray Tracing and increased frame rates will be reduced.

  • Following the version 2.8 update, memory and VRAM usage will be reduced when various types of scenes are being displayed.

  • Added interactivity to the willows and other environment assets in Chronorift Metropolis on PC.

  • Adjusted the effects of the interaction between a character and fallen leaves while walking or running on PC under different frame rates.

Audio

**

Sounds Settings**

Added the "Mute when Game is in the Background" option on PC

  • Access the "Mute when Game is in the Background" option via Settings > Sounds > Volume.

  • When the option is enabled, the game will be muted if minimized to the taskbar or running in the background.

  • Adjusted the background music for some screens to make it mesh better with the content being displayed.

  • Adjusted the background music and sound effects in certain scenes.

Other

**

Beta Features**

Added the "Selective Download" and "Resource Cleanup" features on Mobile

(※This feature is at the testing stage and will be available only on some Android devices and iOS devices in Version 2.8.)

  • On the login screen, a selective download menu will appear, and the necessary part of the Core Assets will be downloaded by default. When the download is complete, you will enter the game.

  • In the game, based on your current progress, the remaining assets may be downloaded as you play.

  • Resource Cleanup is a feature that accompanies the selective download feature. This feature allows you to delete cutscenes that you have watched and are saved on your device, and it can be accessed via Settings > Other > Resource Cleanup.

  • Due to our testing schedule, the released selective download feature will be upgraded after the version 2.8 update. Please note that this feature will be inaccessible during the scheduled upgrade maintenance.

This feature is at the testing stage and is subject to changes.

**

Game Client Auto-start**

Added a "game client auto-start" feature on PC.

  • The game will now automatically restart on PC when the asset download is complete.

  • This feature will not be available on some platforms.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

[Bug Fixes]

**

Resonators & Weapons**

  • Fixed an issue where some of Resonator Qiuyuan's skills might cause parts of the Resonator's character model, including the bamboo hat, to behave abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue where the annotation for the term "Internal Security Agency" found in Resonator Qiuyuan's Forte Examination Report, accessible via Resonators > Information > Experience, contained textual errors.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Qiuyuan's Dash Voiceline could not be triggered.

  • Fixed an issue where the background music might fail to play properly after Resonator Qiuyuan cast Resonance Liberation "Sundering Strike."

  • Fixed an issue where when Resonator Qiuyuan cast Resonance Liberation "Sundering Strike" or entered the "Inksplash of Mind" state, the skill VFX caused some Event pages to display abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue in Camera mode where Resonator Galbrena's character model behaved abnormally when certain Idle Animations were displayed.

  • Fixed an issue in the "Dreaming Deep" event where some of Resonator Cartethyia's skills could not hit targets with the Resonator Buff "Resoluteness" selected.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Fleurdelys could not walk on water surfaces under certain circumstances while in the "Rinascita - Avinoleum" area.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Lupa's character model behaved abnormally in certain Idle Animations.

  • Fixed an issue where the character models of Resonators Cantarella and Phoebe on the Resonators - Overview screen behaved abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Brant's Convene Animation in Resonator Showcase had glitches.

  • Fixed an issue where the Character Stories in Resonator Shorekeeper's Experience contained textual errors.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Jianxin's Idle Animation could not be triggered after the Resonator performed Heavy Attack "Primordial Chi Spiral."

  • Fixed an issue where the effects of the outgoing Resonator's Outro Skill might not be applied to some Resonators under certain frame rates.

  • Fixed an issue where certain Resonators were not able to cast Resonance Liberation while on a Gondola.

  • Fixed an issue where the visual effects of certain skills by some Resonators failed to display properly.

  • Fixed an issue where the character models sank underground in certain scenes.

**

Enemies & Echoes**

  • Fixed an issue where Fenrico's Voiceline played upon defeat might play multiple times.

  • Fixed an issue where restarting the game after defeating an enemy under certain circumstances might cause the same enemy to appear again.

  • Fixed an issue where the volume of the sound effects for when an Echo is dropped might become abnormal under certain circumstances.

**

Features**

  • Fixed an issue where delivering Sonance Caskets in the "Jinzhou City - Mt. Firmament" area might cause some of the content on the Casket Delivery screen to display abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue where newly-acquired Echoes would be locked or discarded automatically despite the fact that auto-discard/auto-lock was not enabled in Echo Management, accessible via Data Bank > Data Merge > Echo Management.

  • Fixed an issue where an incorrect image was displayed for Hooscamp Clapperclaw on the "Data Bank - Echo Collection" screen.

  • Fixed an issue where detecting certain enemies via Guidebook > Enemy Tracing was impossible under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where the sizes of certain icons on the Map were abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where the icon of a fellow Rover remained in the same place on the Map after the fellow Rover changed locations.

  • Fixed an issue in Controller mode where certain player actions might cause some items to become unselectable on the Resonator Ascension Planner screen.

  • Fixed an issue where certain player actions could make Lootmapper or Casket Sonar unusable.

  • Fixed an issue where the item "Pilgrim's Scriptures" could not be obtained under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where the FSR3 option could not be enabled on devices equipped with AMD graphics cards that met the requirements.

**

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events**

  • Fixed an issue where random red dots might appear on the screen during the "Phantasma Dreamland" screen.

  • Fixed an issue where entering the "Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways" event might cause a random pop-up to appear on the screen.

  • Fixed an issue in the current iteration of the "Tower of Adversity" event where the lock-on might fail to function properly with Echo Skill "Thundering Mephis."

**

Quests**

  • Fixed an issue in Main Quest "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides" where the text and audio did not match in some places.

  • Fixed an issue in Main Quest "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides" where some dialogue choices contained textual errors.

  • Fixed an issue in Main Quest "By Moon's Fated Light" where using Flight in certain scenes would hide the skill icons.

  • Fixed an issue in Main Quest "By Sun's Burning Hand" where certain Wingrays might be missing.

  • Fixed an issue in Event Quest "All Out! Towards the Peaks of Prestige" where the location of the NPC "Conqueror of Prestige" was abnormal under certain circumstances, preventing quest progression.

**

Environment**

  • Fixed an issue where the waterfall sound effects were missing in the "Rinascita - Sanguis Plateaus - Three Heroes' Crest " area.

  • Fixed an issue where the ambient sounds were interrupted in the "Rinascita - Sanguis Plateaus - Maroonwood " area.

  • Fixed an issue where using Flight in certain parts of the "Rinascita - Septimont" area would cause a Resonator to be transported to other locations.

  • Fixed an issue where certain NPC dialogues in the "Rinascita - Septimont - Capitoline Hill" area contained errors.

  • Fixed an issue in Mobile mode where riding the Gondola in the "Rinascita - Avinoleum" would cause the associated visual effects to experience glitches.

  • Fixed an issue where some NPCs had different names in different scenes.

  • Fixed an issue on Mac where water surface interactions were missing.

  • Fixed an issue where certain environment assets in the "Huanglong - Dim Forest" area behaved abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue on Mobile where the screen might flash while displaying certain scenes.

  • Resolved known instances of objects clipping through each other or floating in mid-air.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event Winners Reveal
entry.content:
Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides" has concluded, and we want to express our heartfelt appreciation to all participants for their dedication and creativity in our fan art event. Let's view the winning entries and their contributors!
